introduction: The film, produced by Marek Rozenbaum and the Dardenne brothers, was released on DVD by Éditions Montparnasse  as part of a boxset also including 2008's Langue sacrée, langue parlée and 2011's Traduire, with which they form a trilogy.It contains interviews with Israeli artists and writers such as Aharon Appelfeld, Evgenia Dodina, Salman Masalha, Agi Mishol, Amal Murkus, Prof. Dr. Haviva Pedaya, Haïm Ulliel, and Meir Wieseltier who write in Hebrew even though it is not their native language about the importance of language and asks how the struggle between their mother tongue and Hebrew has affected their art.
